name: heal-powder
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any status ailment.  Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.
short_effect: Cures any status ailment, but lowers happiness.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A bitter powder
that heals all
status problems.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A bitter powder
that heals all
status problems.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It heals all the status problems of
one POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It heals all the status problems of a
single Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A very bitter medicine powder.
When consumed, it heals all of
a Pokémon’s status conditions.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A very bitter medicinal powder. It can be used once
to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
